mapper.update: update directory_number set dn_id = #{dnId}, plcode = #{plcode}, ndc = #{ndc}, hlcode = #{hlcode}, dn_num = #{dnNum}, dn_status = #{dnStatus}, dn_status_mod_date = #{dnStatusModDate}, dealer_id = #{dealerId}, dn_assign_date = #{dnAssignDate}, dn_phone_flag = #{dnPhoneFlag}, dn_type = #{dnType}, dn_status_requ = #{dnStatusRequ}, dn_sta_requ_date = #{dnStaRequDate}, dn_assign = #{dnAssign}, dn_entdate = #{dnEntdate}, dn_moddate = #{dnModdate}, dn_modflag = #{dnModflag}, dn_auth = #{dnAuth}, evcode = #{evcode}, hmcode = #{hmcode}, local_prefix_len = #{localPrefixLen}, simpoh_id = #{simpohId}, simpot_id = #{simpotId}, simpot_batch = #{simpotBatch}, external_ind = #{externalInd}, block_ind = #{blockInd}, extension_length_max = #{extensionLengthMax}, dn_auth_pending = #{dnAuthPending}, rec_version = #{recVersion}, dirnum_npcode = #{dirnumNpcode}, vpn_id = #{vpnId}, static_pdp_required = #{staticPdpRequired}, roaming_allowed = #{roamingAllowed}, transaction_id = #{transactionId}, business_unit_id = #{businessUnitId}, reserved_for_porting_ind = #{reservedForPortingInd}, ported_number_ind = #{portedNumberInd}, rscode = #{rscode} where dn_id = #{dnId};
